name: A. Perfect Permutation
statement:
A is a sequence of integers , consisting of distinct positive integers,
each of them doesn’t exceed . Let’s denote the -th element of
permutation as . We’ll call number the size of permutation .Nickolas
adores permutations. He likes some permutations more than the others. He
calls such permutations perfect. A permutation is such permutation that
for any ( is the permutation size) the following equations hold and .
Nickolas asks you to print any perfect permutation of size for the given
